participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and adventurous, with a passion for nature and creativity.
participant_1.background: I have a warm, welcoming smile that makes people want to be my friend. I love to cut down trees. Sometimes I wish I did not have to wake up in the morning. I love to tinker with my convertible car and take it for a spin on the weekends. I work for the discovery channel creating videos.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and determined, with a keen interest in personal growth and martial arts.
participant_2.background: I'm single and focusing on my martial arts. I never cook. I live in the suburbs of a major city. My favorite people are the ones who get me out of my comfort zone and make me try new things. I eat a lot of fish.

content.text: Hello, how is your day going?
Going good! I just got my first tattoo!
Oh wow, cool! What is it of?
It's a koi fish, I love fish and they're really pretty.
That's awesome! I love fish too, I'm always eating them!
Oh yeah? What's your favorite kind?
I love salmon, but I also really like tuna.
I love tuna too! I actually eat a lot of fish because I'm a vegetarian.
Really? I didn't know that! That's so cool!
Yeah, I've been a vegetarian for about a year now.
Wow, that's a long time! How do you like it?
I love it! I feel so much better, and I'm healthier than ever.
That's great! I'm glad you're happy with it.
Thanks! You seem really nice, do you want to be friends?
Sure, I'd love to be friends!
